alert.note: Alert for Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 8:14PM CDT until June 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Valley County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Sherman County in central Nebraska... Northwestern Howard County in central Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 814 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sherman Reservoir Dam, or 17 miles south of Ord, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sherman Reservoir Dam around 830 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ashton and Cotesfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
